entity_resolution.description: Main topic: Entity resolution or entity matching in scientific papers. Related terms to use for generating table/figure queries: pipeline architecture, matching functions, datasets, precision, recall, F1 score.

medical.description: Main topic: Ultra-processed foods AND cardiovascular risk or cardiovascular disease. Related terms to use for generating table/figure queries: hazard ratio, relative risk, cohort studies, dose-response, forest plots, Kaplan-Meier curves.
